title: Eploring albums' distribution formats: 2000-2020
description: This data story explores the resources related to the distribution formats of albums available on Wikidata, the centralized, linked data repository for all Wikimedia projects, with the goal of overviewing this topic from statistical point of view.

dynamic_elements.text: Over the past two decades, the music industry has undergone significant transformations in the way albums are distributed to listeners. In this data story, we explore the distribution formats of albums from 2000 to 2020, specifically focusing on vinyls, CDs, and streaming platforms. By analyzing the data, we uncover the shifting landscape of album distribution and its impact on the music industry.

dynamic_elements.count_label: Albums published from 2000 to 2020 according to Wikidata
Albums with distribution format published from 2000 to 2020

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Albums published from 2000 to 2020: distribution formats
Albums released as CD from 2000 to 2020

dynamic_elements.text: The advent of digital technology and streaming platforms revolutionized the way we consume music, leading to a decline in physical formats such as compact discs. However, in recent years, a surprising trend has emerged, marking the revival of vinyl records.

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Albums released as vinyls from 2000 to 2020
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?item ?a wd:Q482994;
           wdt:P577 ?date.
  {?item wdt:P437 wd:Q178588} # vinyl record
  UNION
  {?item wdt:P437 wd:Q841983} # LP record


  BIND(YEAR(?date) AS ?label) FILTER(YEAR(?date) <= 2020 && YEAR(?date) > 1999)
}

GROUP BY ?label ?count
ORDER BY ?label

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Music streaming platforms launched over the years

dynamic_elements.text: The table above showcases some of the most notable streaming services that have shaped the digital music landscape. These platforms have revolutionized the way music is accessed and enjoyed, providing a vast library of songs. A visual representation of the locations of these streaming service headquarters can be seen on map below. Each marker corresponds to the respective company's headquarters, showcasing the international reach of the streaming industry.
